HANDLER.PLUGIN_DISABLED: This plugin is disabled by the server administrator
HANDLER.CMD_DISABLED: This command is disabled by the server administrator
HANDLER.OWNER_ONLY: This command is only available to the bot owner
HANDLER.USER_PERMISSIONS: You need the following permissions to run this command: {{permissions}}
HANDLER.BOT_PERMISSIONS: I need the following permissions to run this command: {{permissions}}
HANDLER.COOLDOWN: You are on cooldown! Please wait for {{time}} seconds
HANDLER.ERROR: An error occurred while running this command

HELP.NOT_FOUND: No matching plugin or command found
HELP.MENU_PLACEHOLDER: Select the plugin for which you need help
HELP.EMPTY_CATEGORY: There are no commands in this plugin
HELP.PLUGIN_EMBED_FOOTER: Page {{page}} of {{pages}}. Type {{prefix}}help <command> for more command information

PING.DESCRIPTION: shows the current ping from the bot to the discord servers
PING.TITLE: üèì Pong

PLUGIN.NOT_FOUND: No plugin found with the name: {{plugin}}
PLUGIN.STATUS_SELECT_PROMPT: Select/Unselect the plugins you want to enable/disable them
PLUGIN.STATUS_SELECT_TIMEOUT: Timeout!. You didn't make a selection

LANG.DESCRIPTION: sets the language of the bot
LANG.INVALID_LANG:
Oops! `{{lang}}` is not a valid language.
Available languages: `{{langChoices}}`
LANG.SUCCESS: Success! The language has been set to `{{lang}}`

PREFIX.DESCRIPTION: sets a new prefix for this server
PREFIX.TOO_LONG: The prefix is too long! It must be 2 characters or less.
PREFIX.SUCCESS: New prefix has been set to `{{prefix}}`
